name: ROCKnSNOW Alpine Guiding
description:
If you are searching for your ultimate adventure in the Ziller Valley, that' what we here for. With ROCKnSNOW you are guaranteed to experience your Outdoor Highlight.

We are delighted you allow us to share with you your special experiences.

Safety is our number one priority. With more than 19 accident free years, lies the assurance that you can depend 100% on us.

Our team consists of local, top qualified IVBV mountain guides with many years knowledge and who will put a smile on your face.

We look forward to leading you through rocks, snow, ice, air and water.

ROCKn!

Peter and Team                                  

                         ROCKnSNOW Hotline 0043 664 406 56 50
